To School Station Personnels
In-a joint meeting at Coiambus in April, the In-School Programs
Committee and the School Stations Committee of NAKB discussed many comon
problems and decided to s end a questionnaire to all school station member®
as a first step in determining ©ur needs and how NAEB can best serve thesis
¥e discussed several suggestions 'which had come from committee
members, as well as some which President Graydon had sent us for consider¬
ation* Now we must discover your needs and how you think NAEB can help
before your Committee can recomend action®
Our Committee will meet at Herman* Oklahoma, the last of this
month* Please Mail the questionnaire to me by October 1? {sooner, if
possible) so that further discussion can culminate in recommendations for
action®
Sincerely,
(Mss) Ola B* Killer
Station WPBB
Oak Grove Campus
Flint 3* Michigan
